meanings.sent1: The dancer wore a sequined costume for the performance.
meanings.sent2: Her sequined dress sparkled under the stage lights.
meanings.sent3: The sequined outfit made her look like a glamorous movie star.
meanings.sent4: The sequined gown transformed her into a shining princess.
meanings.sent5: The sequined fabric caught the eye of everyone in the room.

meanings.definition: Covered in small, shiny discs for decoration.
meanings.sent1: The sequined handbag added a touch of glamour to her outfit.
meanings.sent2: The Christmas tree was sequined with sparkling ornaments.
meanings.sent3: The sequined shoes twinkled like stars on her feet.
meanings.sent4: Her sequined phone case reflected the sunlight in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The sequined tablecloth shimmered in the candlelight.
